fields.description: The accuracy comes from the location service on the moble app
fields.label: GPS Accuracy

fields.description:
1.0: Excellent - On zone line
0.9: Very Good - High precision
0.8: Good - Within accuracy range
0.7: Acceptable - Within buffer
0.5: Fair - Near buffer edge
0.3: Poor - May need verification
0.1: Very Poor - Manual review required
fields.label: GPS Confidence

fields.description: Number of GPS samples averaged for this reading
fields.label: GPS Samples Used

fields.description: Whether device was stationary during capture
fields.label: Stationary

fields.description: A buffer is created around the zone based on the gps accuracy. The buffer is a rectangular polygon around the zone.
fields.label: Zone Buffer (m)

fields.description: Distance from scout to nearest zone boundary (meters)
fields.label: Distance (m)
